SELECT CONVERT(varchar(100), d60.ENT_DATE, 23) time, count(d60.SALES_ORDER) as kuan, round((sum(round(case d60.tax_in_price when 'N' then d60.part_price else d60.part_price/(1+d60.TAX_RATE/100.00) end /nullif(dbo.SF_GET_EXCHRATE(d60.rkey,d60.currency_ptr,d60.ent_date),0)*d60.PARTS_ORDERED,2) + round(case when d60.STATE_TOOL_TAX_FLAG = 'N' then d60.total_add_l_price else d60.total_add_l_price /(1+d60.TAX_RATE/100.00) end /nullif(dbo.SF_GET_EXCHRATE(d60.rkey,d60.currency_ptr,d60.ent_date),0),2))/10000),2) as yuan, round(sum(round(d60.PARTS_ORDERED * data0050.unit_sq,4)),2) as pingmi FROM DATA0060 as d60 left join data0060 p60 on p60.Source_JTSo_Ptr=d60.rkey left join data0050 on d60.CUST_PART_PTR=data0050.rkey where d60.ANALYSIS_CODE_5='' and d60.so_style in(0,1,2,9,12,13) and d60.STATUS not in(5) and DateDiff(dd,d60.ENT_DATE,getdate()) <=20
and d60.fin_so_tp=1 and d60.so_tp=1
group by CONVERT(varchar(100), d60.ENT_DATE, 23) order by time
